parameters.name: NamePrefix
parameters.description: The name prefix based on which you want to search for templates.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The size of each page set during the result paging query.

- Upper limit: 100.
- Default value: 10.

parameters.name: State
parameters.description:
The status of the custom transcoding templates that you want to query.

*   **All**: All custom transcoding templates are queried.
*   **Normal**: Normal custom transcoding templates are queried.
*   **Deleted**: Deleted custom transcoding templates are queried.
*   Default value: **All**.
